item.title: On a testé le nouveau vélo électrique familial de Moustache : que demander de plus ?
item.description: Plus besoin de présenter Moustache. C'est la marque française iconique de vélos électriques créée en 2010. Aujourd'hui, c'est 180 emplois, plus de 70 vélos au catalogue et toujours le fameux guidon qui a fait son succès en forme de... moustache. En 2021, Moustache a lancé son premier vélo cargo : le lundi 20 Cargo. 4 ans plus tard, nous avons pu enfin tester sa nouvelle version. Que vaut ce nouveau modèle face à la concurrence ? La réponse dans notre test. ...

item.title: Polar Loop Review: Better Than a Whoop 5.0?
item.description: The new subscription-free fitness band is a solid competitor to Whoop, but with a big caveat.

item.title: The Steam Machine feels like the TV gaming PC I’ve always wanted
item.description: The morning of Monday, October 27th, I started my workweek by asking my colleagues at The Verge for advice on buying a gaming PC. I wanted a small, portable, and semi-powerful machine that could easily sit beneath my living room TV and occasionally move over to my desk to play games or even use for […]

item.title: Pluribus’ third episode throws a bomb into things
item.description: If you weren't clear on just what a miserable person Carol (Rhea Seehorn) is, episode 3 of Pluribus sure makes it obvious. It opens with a flashback, as Carol and her partner Helen (Miriam Shor) are on a dream vacation at an ice hotel in Norway, and all she can do is complain about how […]

item.title: Samsung's Black Friday sale is live: get the lowest prices all year on Galaxy S25 Ultra, OLED TVs, appliances, and more
item.description: Samsung's massive Black Friday sale has just been launched: here are the 14 best deals on everything from high-end TVs to vacuum cleaners.

item.title: Xiaomi Pad 7 : la tablette rivale de l’iPad Air profite du pré-Black Friday pour alléger son prix de 130 €
item.description: Écran 144 Hz, puce Snapdragon 7+ Gen 3, charge rapide... La Xiaomi Pad 7 présente une configuration bien solide, tout en étant affichée à un prix assez contenu. En ce pré-Black Friday, la Fnac et Darty la proposent à 300,99 euros au lieu de 430,99 euros.

item.title: Seagate's new storage looks to cover everything you'll need for the age of AI - including up to 3.2 petabytes in a single enclosure
item.description: Seagate’s Exos 4U100 enclosure delivers multi-petabyte capacity for AI workloads while raising questions about efficiency, security, and long-term scalability.

item.title: An Invasive Disease-Carrying Mosquito Has Spread to the Rocky Mountains
item.description: The Aedes aegypti mosquito that can carry dengue, yellow fever, and Zika was thought to be too reliant on a hot and wet climate to survive in the Mountain West. But now, a population is thriving in Western Colorado.

item.title: The 20 Best Movies on Amazon Prime, WIRED's Picks (November 2025)
item.description: Nosferatu, Merry Little Batman, and Knives Out are just a few of the movies you should be watching on Amazon Prime Video this week.

item.description: Bat-Fam, The Girlfriend, and The Second Best Hospital in the Galaxy are just a few of the shows you should be watching on Amazon Prime Video this week.

item.title: I spent a month testing the new Roku Pro Series (2025), and it’s a solid upgrade on an already high-value TV
item.description: The Roku Pro Series TV (2025) is an excellent lower-cost TV with a unique design and upgraded picture and audio.

item.title: England vs New Zealand live stream: How to watch 2025 Autumn International, TV channels, preview, team news
item.description: All the ways to watch England vs New Zealand live streams online from anywhere as the Autumn Internationals 2025 continue with a possible classic at Twickenham.

item.title: Ethics: My new employee refuses to do some parts of her job. Should I fire her?
item.description: Terminating her would be legal. Is it the right choice? A reader writes: I have a new employee who is refusing to do some parts of her job. She hasn’t done this with me directly, but when I left for a week’s vacation, I gave very clear guidance on what she should be working on. That included learning to use some of our equipment, practicing her job skills, and reviewing training videos with the team....

item.title: This week in business: Shutdown chaos, AI jitters, and a penny farewell
item.description: Tech giants, retailers, and lawmakers all took big swings—some landing cleanly and others missing the mark. This week’s biggest business news is perhaps that the U.S. federal government shutdown finally ended; however, that ending didn’t come without more than a few noteworthy concessions. Meanwhile, a beloved coffee chain walked straight into a strike on one of its biggest promo days, and a regional grocer found a way to turn literal loose change into both PR and foot traffic....

item.title: How to Use the New AI Features in OmniFocus, the Power User’s To-Do List
item.description: One of the Mac’s most popular productivity apps is incorporating generative artificial intelligence in a way that keeps it offline, private, and customizable.

item.title: A Major Leak Spills a Chinese Hacking Contractor’s Tools and Targets
item.description: Plus: State-sponsored AI hacking is here, Google hosts a CBP face recognition app, and more of the week’s top security news.

item.title: This ingenious adapter is the dash cam installation hack I’ve been waiting for
item.description: Dongar's ingenious adapter makes messy dash cam cables a thing of the past – just make sure if it's compatible with your vehicle.

item.title: Dell Black Friday sale is live: check out these 7 laptop deals on our favorite models today
item.description: Dell's huge Black Friday sale is live - check out these excellent prices on laptops that we've tested and loved here at TechRadar.

item.title: Amazon continue les offres pendant le week-end du pré-Black Friday : voici le TOP des deals
item.description: Amazon lance déjà ses premières promotions avant le Black Friday et baisse fortement les prix sur de nombreux produits Tech. Découvrez dès maintenant les meilleures offres à ne pas manquer.
